articles.title: 5 Biggest Win Margins For Teams In ODI History - Man's World India
articles.description: India defeated Sri Lanka by 317 runs to become the first team to win with a margin greater than 300 runs. Here's a list of five of the biggest victories in the history of ODI cricket.
articles.content: India completed a 3-0 clean sweep in the ODI series after winning the last match rather comfortably. Asked to chase 390, Sri Lanka was floored for just 73, with seven batters failing to reach the dou… [+16 chars]
